TopicTitle: Your favorite upcoming feature in KSP2

Articles.Content:
What is your favorite feature (so far) in the upcoming sequel to KSP?
Mine is the amazing new planets to visit and incredible revamps of the old planets and moons

Trailer:
Rings are cool... I hope we will get accretion disks as well but that's unlikely
Mine is the tidy parts list, procedural paint jobs (no more rockets with 50 different seamful variants), flight UI, etc. Just the UI being sorted out in general.
Surface colonies, and new engines to play with.
Nuclear bomb pogo sticks...

The ability to build onsite without downloading 20 cumbersome mods and spending days planning the mission to the nth degree just to arrive on location and realize I forgot to put a robotic arm adapter on the left underside of my doodad and cant match it up with my thingamabob and the only option is to drop it since I can't load it back into the cargo bay. (Frustrated screeching intensifies.)
Better mission planning.
Nuclear pulse propulsion. That and a better game loop facilitated by the colony system.
This sounds so dumb but I really think it's axial tilt and the ability to edit the planet configs without a mod.
